Class BattleUISystem

java.lang.Object
battle.subsystems.BattleUISystem
public class BattleUISystem extends Object
Week 13-03: Tightly Coupled Subsystems (ANTI-PATTERN) Complex UI subsystem for battle sequences. Client must initialize in CORRECT ORDER: 1. init() - Initialize UI framework 2. createBattleUI() - Create UI components 3. showBattleScreen() - Display the UI 4. Then can update UI elements Problem: Client must know these internals!
